title: Being Elmo: A Puppeteer's Journey
synopsis: Narrated by Whoopi Goldberg, this documentary follows the career of puppeteer Kevin Clash, the soft-spoken man behind the furry red monster Elmo.

title: End of Watch
synopsis: Officers Taylor and Zavala patrol the streets of South Central Los Angeles, an area of the city ruled by gangs and riddled with drug violence.

title: What Happened, Miss Simone?
synopsis: Using never-before-heard recordings, rare archival footage and her best-known songs, this is the story of legendary singer and activist Nina Simone.

title: Miss Representation
synopsis: Explore how the mainstream media's often disparaging portrayals of women contribute to the under-representation of females in positions of leadership.

title: The Boy and the World
synopsis: Young Cuca leaves his idyllic village on a grand adventure to find his father, who has traveled to the city seeking work.

title: Despicable Me
synopsis: Villainous Gru hatches a plan to steal the moon from the sky. But he has a tough time staying on task after three orphans land in his care.

title: Minority Report
synopsis: In the late 21st century, when technology can predict crimes before they're committed, a top 'Precrime' cop is targeted for a murder charge.

title: A Single Man
synopsis: This stream-of-consciousness drama centers on a day in the life of a gay college professor who's reeling from his longtime lover's recent death.

title: Quincy
synopsis: This documentary profiles music and culture icon Quincy Jones, offering unprecedented access to his private life and stories from his unparalleled career.

title: Kevin Hart: Seriously Funny
synopsis: With his unique hip-hop style delivery, African American stand-up comedian Kevin Hart expounds on life at a sold-out concert performance.

title: Y Tu Mama Tambien
synopsis: When rich teens Tenoch and Julio meet the alluring, older Luisa, they try to impress her with stories of a road trip, then convince her to join them.

title: Berserk: The Golden Age Arc I - The Egg of the King
synopsis: Loner Guts is recruited by Griffith and his band of mercenaries, but their ensuing success as a full-fledged army could lead to a horrible fate.

title: Room on the Broom
synopsis: A gentle witch with a ginger braid offers rides to a variety of animals on her increasingly crowded broom, much to her grumpy cat's chagrin.

title: The Naked Gun
synopsis: While seeking his partner's ruthless killer, incredibly thick police officer Frank Drebin stumbles upon on a sordid plot to off Queen Elizabeth.

title: Mike Birbiglia: What I Should Have Said Was Nothing: Tales from My Secret Public Journal
synopsis: Mike Birbiglia performs in this live concert special that features a riotous selection of the unique insights and observations culled from his diary.

title: Dil Se
synopsis: A radio broadcaster's intense attraction to a mysterious woman opens the door to a tidal wave of powerful emotions and desires.

title: The Untold Tales of Armistead Maupin
synopsis: This documentary traces the life of 'Tales of the City' author Armistead Maupin, from his conservative roots to his rise as an LGBTQ champion.

title: I Am Divine
synopsis: This captivating documentary explores the life and work of filmmaker John Waters's muse: internationally celebrated drag superstar Divine.

title: Playing for Time
synopsis: Captured by Nazis and sent to Auschwitz, a Jewish musician is assigned to soothe other prisoners marching to their deaths in the gas chambers.

title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
synopsis: Indiana Jones, his young sidekick and a spoiled songbird get more than they bargained for when they go to India in search of a missing magical stone.

title: How to Change the World
synopsis: In the 1970s, a group of activists who gathered to protest nuclear testing formed the iconic Greenpeace environmental organization.

title: K-on! the movie
synopsis: The seniors in Sakuragaoka High School's music club live out the graduation trip of their dreams when they celebrate by performing in London.

title: Jim Gaffigan: Obsessed
synopsis: Comic Jim Gaffigan delivers his sardonic take on topics like eating, exercise, weddings and his five kids in this live stand-up special.

title: Hell or High Water
synopsis: In a desperate bid to save their family ranch, two brothers stage a series of clever bank robberies with a pair of Texas Rangers in hot pursuit.

title: Mucize
synopsis: Sent away from his family to a remote mountain town, teacher Mahir helps the villagers build a school -- and inspires a path to hope for them all.

title: Bana Masal Anlatma
synopsis: Minibus driver Riza is a steady presence in his close-knit neighborhood, until he brings home a dreamy beauty and throws everything into chaos.

title: For the Love of Spock
synopsis: The son of actor Leonard Nimoy directs this moving look at his father's portrayal of Spock, the iconic 'Star Trek' character he played for 50 years.

title: On Body and Soul
synopsis: Two shy and socially awkward co-workers in Budapest form a special bond through a mysterious mystic connection that manifests in a dream.

title: The C Word
synopsis: To solve the mystery of cancer, challenging the status quo is a must. Witness how lifestyle and societal changes may help beat the disease.

title: Louis C.K. 2017
synopsis: Louis C.K. muses on religion, eternal love, giving dogs drugs, email fights, teachers and more in a live performance from Washington, D.C.

title: Dear Zindagi
synopsis: Accustomed to living an unfocused life, a promising cinematographer meets an unconventional therapist who introduces her to a new way of thinking.

title: Beyond the Mat
synopsis: Documentarian Barry Blaustein exposes the fascinating reality of pro wrestling through sobering interviews and eye-opening footage.

title: Franca: Chaos and Creation
synopsis: A documentary filmmaker chronicles the life and times of his mother, Franca Sozzani, the editor of Italian Vogue and a fashion-world provocateur.

title: Tom Segura: Disgraceful
synopsis: Tom Segura gives voice to the sordid thoughts you'd never say out loud, with blunt musings on porn, parking lot power struggles, parenthood and more.

title: The Florida Project
synopsis: A mischievous 6-year-old finds the magic in her own circumstances while living with her troubled mom in a budget motel near Disney World.

title: Monty Python: The Meaning of Live
synopsis: From heyday to curtain call, this documentary offers a rare glimpse of the legendary Monty Python troupe as it stages live shows after a long hiatus.

title: Bad Genius
synopsis: A top student gets pulled into a cheating racket with increasingly higher risks and even higher rewards. But she may lose much more than she gains.

title: The Blue Umbrella
synopsis: A charming allegory based on a novella by Ruskin Bond, this visually stunning film from India explores themes of greed, loneliness, longing and loss.

title: Highway
synopsis: City girl Veera is kidnapped on the eve of her wedding, but as her captors take her through the countryside, Veera finds herself feeling emancipated.

title: Gie
synopsis: Indonesian activist Soe Hok Gie experiences a political awakening during the tumultuous regimes of Suharto and Sukarno. Inspired by true events.

title: Bhavesh Joshi Superhero
synopsis: When his best friend is killed for uncovering political corruption, an idealistic young man decides to become a masked fighter for justice.

title: ​​Kuch Bheege Alfaaz
synopsis: After accidentally connecting over the Internet, two strangers form a tight friendship -- not knowing they already share a bond.

title: Wake Up Sid
synopsis: A spoiled trust fund brat finds himself stuck in a rut of meaningless late-night parties -- until he meets a significantly older woman and writer.

title: The Sinking Of Van Der Wijck
synopsis: When a young man leaves home to fulfill the wishes of his late father, he meets and falls in love with a woman from a very different background.

title: Jodhaa Akbar
synopsis: In 16th-century India, what begins as a strategic alliance between a Mughal emperor and a Hindu princess becomes a genuine opportunity for true love.

title: Kai Po Che!
synopsis: This Bollywood drama tells the story of three best friends who dream of starting a cricket training academy in Ahmedabad for very different reasons.

title: Do Dooni Chaar
synopsis: A struggling math teacher holds down a second job to keep his family afloat. But when he receives a wedding invitation, he's determined to attend.

title: ADAM SANDLER 100% FRESH
synopsis: From 'Heroes' to 'Ice Cream Ladies' -- Adam Sandler's comedy special hits you with new songs and jokes in an unexpected, groundbreaking way.

title: Happy as Lazzaro
synopsis: Purehearted teen Lazzaro is content living as a sharecropper in rural Italy, but an unlikely friendship with the marquise's son will change his world.

title: My Little Pony Friendship Is Magic: Best Gift Ever
synopsis: The ponies get in the spirit of the holidays by drawing names for a gift exchange, then race around Equestria in search of the perfect presents.

title: Ayotzinapa, el paso de la tortuga
synopsis: Delving into the disappearance of 43 college students in Mexico, this documentary seeks to give justice and a voice to the victims and their families.

title: Power Paandi
synopsis: Retired, restless and constantly butting heads with his son, a former stuntman escapes on a road trip that becomes a journey to find his first love.

title: Mr. Church
synopsis: A temporary personal chef, a terminally ill single mother and her young daughter form an unlikely bond that redefines the meaning of family.

title: A Twelve Year Night
synopsis: Future Uruguayan president José Mujica and his fellow Tupamaro political prisoners fight to survive 12 years of solitary confinement and torture.

title: The Incredibles 2
synopsis: When Elastigirl gets recruited for a high-profile crime-fighting mission, Mr. Incredible takes on his toughest assignment ever: full-time parenting.

title: Pahuna
synopsis: Fleeing unrest in their native Nepal, three young siblings separated from their parents must beat the odds to survive on their own in India.

title: Habibie and Ainun
synopsis: This companion to 2016's 'Rudy Habibie' traces the relationship between Indonesia’s third president and his wife behind the scenes of their public lives.

title: Bert Kreischer: The Machine
synopsis: From his run-in with a grizzly bear to partying with the Russian mafia, the shirtless comic returns with laugh-out-loud tales in this stand-up special.

title: Incredibles 2 (Spanish Version)
synopsis: When Elastigirl gets recruited for a high-profile crime-fighting mission, Mr. Incredible takes on his toughest assignment ever: full-time parenting.

title: Kevin James: Sweat the Small Stuff
synopsis: The film and television star riffs on life's many royal pains in this hourlong special taped at New York City's Hudson Theatre in 2001.

title: The Boy Who Harnessed the Wind
synopsis: Inspired by a science book, 13-year-old William Kamkwamba builds a wind turbine to save his Malawian village from famine. Based on a true story.

title: I Am
synopsis: Four individuals in modern India grapple with their identities amid social taboos, trauma and brutal sexual discrimination in this quartet of stories.

title: Burning
synopsis: An aspiring writer goes to the airport to pick up a high school friend returning from a trip to Africa but is disheartened to see her with another man.

title: De ce eu?
synopsis: A young prosecutor is assigned a career-making case involving a colleague but soon starts to question the motivations behind the charges.

title: Stree
synopsis: Once a year, men in a small town fear abduction by an eccentric female spirit. A young tailor dismisses the idea of the ghost -- until he falls for her.

title: Ek Hasina Thi
synopsis: Imprisoned for underworld crimes she didn’t commit, a vengeful woman breaks free and goes scorched earth on the smooth-talking suitor who framed her.

title: I Lost My Body
synopsis: Romance, mystery and adventure intertwine as a young man falls in love and a severed hand scours Paris for its owner in this mesmerizing animated film.

title: The Two Popes
synopsis: At a key turning point for the Catholic Church, Pope Benedict XVI forms a surprising friendship with the future Pope Francis. Inspired by true events.

title: Ghayal
synopsis: Framed for his older brother's murder, a boxer seeks violent revenge against the true killer who's torn his family apart.

title: Mandi
synopsis: Forbidden love, fraying loyalties and flagrant hypocrisy emerge when sanctimonious politicians drive a madam’s brothel from the heart of Hyderabad.

title: Masameer - The Movie
synopsis: A young girl passionate about AI sets out to make an impact as three friends become crime-fighting superheroes. Based on the hit animated web series.

title: Magnificent
synopsis: An industrialist's daughter is forced to marry a rich heir by her greedy grandmother as her adopted sister bonds with the charismatic wedding planner.

title: InuYasha: The Movie 2: The Castle Beyond the Looking Glass
synopsis: With their biggest foe seemingly defeated, InuYasha and his friends return to everyday life. But the peace is soon shattered by an emerging new enemy.

title: Ip Man 2
synopsis: New in Hong Kong, martial arts instructor Ip Man perseveres and retaliates against his rivals' opposition to the Wing Chun fighting style he teaches.

title: Instructions Not Included
synopsis: Unable to locate the elusive mother of a baby girl left on his doorstep, an Acapulco playboy unexpectedly begins to develop feelings for the tot.

title: Frances Ha
synopsis: Determined to make it as a modern dancer in New York, a young woman pursues her unlikely goal with more enthusiasm than natural talent.

title: Delhi Belly
synopsis: Three flatmates get involved in the shady business belonging to one roomie's fiancé, and discover that a global crime syndicate is gunning for them.

title: Miracle
synopsis: U.S. hockey coach Herb Brooks unites a motley crew of college athletes and turns them into a force to be reckoned with at the 1980 Winter Olympics.

title: Hugo
synopsis: A 12-year-old orphan takes up residence behind the walls of a Parisian train station, where he meets a girl who holds the key to his destiny.

title: Jeff Dunham: Controlled Chaos
synopsis: Politically incorrect and often raunchy humor pepper ventriloquist Dunham's live concert performance featuring characters Walter, Achmed and Peanut.

title: Tucker and Dale vs. Evil
synopsis: Expecting to relax at their 'vacation' cabin, two backwoods boys see their trip turn into a nightmare when they're accused of being psychotic killers.

title: Sarah's Key
synopsis: Paris, 1942: To protect her brother from the police arresting Jewish families, a young girl hides him away, promising to come back for him.

title: Donald Glover: Weirdo
synopsis: Fearlessly funny stand-up comic and sitcom star Donald Glover puts on a live show in New York, confessing his love for Cocoa Puffs and Toys 'R' Us.

title: Saving Mr. Banks
synopsis: When Walt Disney sets his sights on obtaining the rights to the children's classic 'Mary Poppins,' the book's author proves a tough nut to crack.

title: Hitler - A Career
synopsis: This documentary examines how Adolf Hitler's talent for manipulation, psychology and image-making led him from humble origins to near-world conquest.

title: The Evil Dead
synopsis: During a stop at a remote cabin deep within the woods, a group of teens begins turning into flesh-eating zombies in director Sam Raimi's cult classic.

title: The Garden of Words
synopsis: When a lonely teenager skips his morning classes to sit in a lovely garden, he meets a mysterious older woman who shares his feelings of alienation.

title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
synopsis: Dreamy delivery girl Ramona captures Scott Pilgrim's heart, but he must vanquish all seven of her evil exes in martial arts battles to win her love.

title: Freedom Writers
synopsis: While her at-risk students are reading classics such as 'The Diary of Anne Frank,' a teacher asks them to keep journals about their troubled lives.

title: Hum Aapke Hain Koun
synopsis: Prem is a budding businessman being tutored by his elder brother, Rajesh. Nisha is the carefree favorite of her elder sister Pooja. Although it's love at first sight for Prem and Nisha, they decide to sacrifice their happiness for their...

title: Tom Segura: Mostly Stories
synopsis: The bearded, bawdy and comically bitter Tom Segura gets real about body piercings, the 'Area 51' of men's bodies, and the lie he told Mike Tyson.

title: Jaane Tu... Ya Jaane Na
synopsis: Soft-spoken Jai and spitfire beauty Aditi couldn't be more different -- but their family and friends know that they're a perfect match.

title: Ali Wong: Baby Cobra
synopsis: Ali Wong's stand up special delves into her sexual adventures, hoarding, the rocky road to pregnancy, and why feminism is terrible.

title: My Happy Family
synopsis: A middle-aged wife and mother of two shocks her traditional, multigenerational Georgian household when she announces she's going to live by herself.

title: Remember
synopsis: Following the written instructions of his friend, senile Zev crosses the country to find and murder the Nazi who killed their families in Auschwitz.

title: Forever Chape
synopsis: In the wake of the plane crash that claimed the lives of 71 people, the Brazilian soccer club Chapecoense seeks to rebuild the team that made history.

title: The White Helmets
synopsis: As daily airstrikes pound civilian targets in Syria, a group of indomitable first responders risk their lives to rescue victims from the rubble.

title: A Grand Night In: The Story of Aardman
synopsis: Aardman Animations icons Wallace & Gromit, Morph and more join fans and collaborators for a retrospective celebrating the studio's 40th anniversary.

title: Joe Rogan: Triggered
synopsis: Unleashing his inquisitive, intense comedic style, Rogan explores everything from raising kids and Santa Claus to pot gummies and talking to dolphins.

title: U Turn
synopsis: A reporter must hunt for the truth behind a strange murder after she crosses paths with a young cop and becomes the investigation's prime suspect.
